field.title: 1. I am a participant in the Northern Ireland Farm Quality Assurance Scheme, and as such abide by the Product Standard and Rules of that Scheme.
2. I am a registered participant in the scheme operated by Aberdeen Angus Quality Beef Ltd (referred to hereafter as AAQB) and abide by the rules of that scheme.
3. I understand that any breach of the Codes in the FQAS Product Standard and Rules may lead to my exclusion from FQAS and consequently my exclusion as a supplying farm for AAQB.

4. I agree to provide full and accurate information to NIFCC for the purpose of being a supplying farm for AAQB, and understand that this information (including appropriate farm audit details) may be used by LMC/Foyle Food Group/AAQB as part of their Quality Management System.
5. I agree to my premises, livestock and records being audited by NIFCC for the purpose of being a supplying farm for AAQB.
6. I agree that samples may be taken for the purpose of DNA testing on farm/at slaughter/post slaughter as deemed necessary by AAQB or the Foyle Food Group
7. I have checked the information given on this form and confirm that it is correct to the best of my knowledge
8. I agree to inform AAQB or the Foyle Food Group of any changes to my farming circumstances that may affect this declaration.
